pages.name: Ritual of the Feathered Knife
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.

Drains health from players in its area and puts the LP into a nearby blood altar.$(br2)$(water)Water Runes: 4$(br)$(air)Air Runes: 8$(br)$(fire)Fire Runes: 8$(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 16$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 40

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total Will in the Aura.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Uses the player's Incense to increase the yield.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Sets the minimum health for sacrificing to 10%. Overridden by Steadfast for the Owner if active.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Increases the yield of the ritual based on total Will.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Sets the minimum health for sacrificing from 30% to 70%.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Altar) This range defines the area that the ritual searches for the blood altar. Changing this will either expand or limit the range to a certain region. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 10 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Damage) This defines where the ritual will damage a player. Players inside of this range will receive damage over time up to the specified limit. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 25 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15
